label: 人形, 形代
本: Jewel in the Ashes: Buddha Relics and Power in Early Medieval Japan . Harvard University Asia Center . 2000
見出し読み: ひとがた, かたしろ
見出し読み_mod: ひとがた, かたしろ
説明文: Paper or wooden human image used in purification rites at shrines, usually breathed on or rubbed on the body to expiate impurities.
